thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Pepi Weinrauch

author: Pepi Weinrauch
title: Pepi Weinrauch
text:
My first experience was mixed. The first job was completed swiftly and efficiently, and I was delighted.
My second task, assembling a flat pack bed, had to be cancelled on the day, due to illness of the worker. I have terminal cancer, and I was relying on this task being bcompleted on time in order to rest well that night.
I understand that my airtasker was ill, but there did not seem to be any recourse for me in this situation.
Any suggestions?
